profile_summary:
As a Senior IT Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in troubleshooting and problem-solving across diverse environments, utilizing a robust **tech stack** that includes **AWS**, **Proxmox**, **ESXI**, **Linux**, **BSD**, **Grafana**, **ElasticSearch**, **Splunk**, **OpenVPN**, **IPSec**, **WireGuard**, and **pfSense**. My strong foundation in ITIL enables me to implement best practices for IT service management and enhance team management capabilities.
I have a proven track record in building high-performance solutions in complex sectors, leveraging modern **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python** frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. My experience also spans cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS**, complemented by the development of secure, enterprise-grade applications that meet compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I bring hands-on expertise in deploying **MLOps** workflows and integrating machine learning capabilities using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
